alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 7:52PM EST until February 18 at 10:37PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Elliott and Rowan. In southeast Kentucky, Morgan. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 750 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated an intense band of showers containing rainfall rates of over 2 inches per hour at times. These showers will put down up to a quick inch of rainfall, leading to minor flooding in low lying areas. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Morehead, Hamm, Wagner, Vale, Wagner Store, Elliottville, Crix, Minor, Christy, Blairs Mills, Pelfrey, Craney, Fannin Valley, Farley, Gates, Haldeman, Rodburn, Lick Fork, Leisure and Lytten. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
